ValidationRule.description: Ensures deleted customers have required audit fields populated
ValidationRule.errorConditionFormula: AND( IsDeleted__c = true, OR( ISBLANK(DeletedDate__c), ISBLANK(DeletedBy__c), ISBLANK(MergedInto__c) ) )
ValidationRule.errorMessage: Deleted customers must have Deleted Date, Deleted By, and Merged Into fields populated.
